segment.source: How to Create an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Create an Application License Group

segment.source: How to Create an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Create an Application License Group

segment.source: How to Create an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Create an Application License Group

segment.source: The Application Virtualization Server Management Console enables you to organize and manage application licenses.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization Server Management Console enables you to organize and manage application licenses.

segment.source: Depending on the type of license group, you can control who has access to the application and how many users can access an application at a time.
segment.target: Depending on the type of license group, you can control who has access to the application and how many users can access an application at a time.

segment.source: You can use the following procedure to create an application license group.
segment.target: You can use the following procedure to create an application license group.

segment.source: To create an application license group
segment.target: To create an application license group

segment.source: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, right-click the Application Licenses node.
segment.target: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, right-click the Application Licenses node.

segment.source: Select one of the following menu items that corresponds to the type of license group you want to create, and complete the pages in the associated New License Wizard:
segment.target: Select one of the following menu items that corresponds to the type of license group you want to create, and complete the pages in the associated New License Wizard:

segment.source: New Unlimited License
segment.target: New Unlimited License

segment.source: New Concurrent License
segment.target: New Concurrent License

segment.source: New Named License
segment.target: New Named License

segment.source: Click Finish.
segment.target: Click Finish.
